text: haey mou sa ban pol tha ao mcheasa robsa yeungokhnhom. pit brakd nasa trong ban bratan dl hvie r aon ning m ndrei robsa ke nouv pheapotrachah trachng ning tropy sa mb tde nowknong chivit lokey nih . ao mcheasa robsa yeungokhnhom. ( kar bratan robsa trong noh) theu v aoy puokke v nge vng pi meakra robsa trong . ao mcheasa robsa yeungokhnhom. saum trong bamphlanh tropy sa mb tde robsa puokke ning baohtra phchit leu chetd robsa puokke phng choh daoysaarte puokke kmean chomnue rhautadl puokke bankheunh tearounakamm da chhucheab
